hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT COUNT(aa) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT aa.id) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT aa) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE
AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.id = :id
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.sourceObjectId = :activityInstanceId ORDER BY aa.archiveDate DESC, aa.id DESC
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.sourceObjectId = :activityInstanceId AND aa.stateId = :stateId
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.rootContainerId = :rootContainerId
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.rootContainerId = :rootContainerId AND aa.stateId IN (:stateIds)

SELECT COUNT(aa) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE AND assigneeId IN ( SELECT u.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserImpl u WHERE u.managerUserId = :managerUserId )

SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE AND assigneeId IN ( SELECT u.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserImpl u WHERE u.managerUserId = :managerUserId )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT aa.id) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAUserTaskInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND(supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAUserTaskInstanceImpl AS aa, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE terminal = TRUE AND aa.logicalGroup1 = supervisor.processDefId AND(supervisor.userId = :supervisorId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :supervisorId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(aa) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE

select COUNT(DISTINCT ap) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.archiveDate = ( SELECT MAX(aa2.archiveDate) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAUserTaskInstanceImpl AS aa2 WHERE aa2.sourceObjectId = ap.sourceObjectId ) AND ap.stateId != 8 AND (ap.startedBy = :userId OR (a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND a.stable = TRUE AND a.assigneeId = :userId) )

select DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.archiveDate = ( SELECT MAX(aa2.archiveDate) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAUserTaskInstanceImpl AS aa2 WHERE aa2.sourceObjectId = ap.sourceObjectId ) AND ap.stateId != 8 AND (ap.startedBy = :userId OR (a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND a.stable = TRUE AND a.assigneeId = :userId) )

SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(aa) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAActivityInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE terminal = TRUE
SELECT aa FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE aa.rootContainerId = :rootContainerId ORDER BY aa.id

SELECT new org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.SFlowNodeInstanceStateCounter(name AS name, stateName AS statename, count(aa) AS numberof) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAFlowNodeInstanceImpl AS aa WHERE logicalGroup4 = :parentProcessInstanceId AND terminal = TRUE GROUP BY name, stateName ORDER BY name ASC, stateName ASC
SELECT ac FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAConnectorInstanceImpl AS ac
SELECT COUNT(ac) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAConnectorInstanceImpl AS ac
SELECT DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.processDefinitionId = :processDefinitionId
SELECT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap
SELECT COUNT(ap.id) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap
SELECT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.sourceObjectId IN (:sourceObjectIds)
SELECT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.id = :id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4)
SELECT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS processsupervisor WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ap.processDefinitionId = processsupervisor.processDefId

SELECT DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS processsupervisor WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ap.processDefinitionId = processsupervisor.processDefId

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS processsupervisor WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND ap.processDefinitionId = processsupervisor.processDefId

SELECT DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS processsupervisor WHERE ap.callerId = -1 AND ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND ap.processDefinitionId = processsupervisor.processDefId

SELECT DISTINCT ap.sourceObjectId FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ap.rootProcessInstanceId = :rootProcessInstanceId AND ap.callerId != -1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap.id) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ( ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ( EXISTS (SELECT at.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS at WHERE (at.logicalGroup2 = ap.sourceObjectId AND (at.executedBy = :userId OR at.executedBySubstitute = :userId)) ) OR ap.startedBy = :userId ) )

SELECT DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap WHERE ( ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ( EXISTS (SELECT at.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAHumanTaskInstanceImpl AS at WHERE (at.logicalGroup2 = ap.sourceObjectId AND (at.executedBy = :userId OR at.executedBySubstitute = :userId)) ) OR ap.startedBy = :userId ) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ap.processDefinitionId = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :userId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :userId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor WHERE ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND ap.processDefinitionId = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :userId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :userId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ap) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND ap.processDefinitionId = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :userId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :userId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT ap FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.SAProcessInstanceImpl AS ap, org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.impl.SUserTaskInstanceImpl AS a WHERE ap.stateId IN (6,7,3,4) AND a.rootContainerId = ap.sourceObjectId AND ap.processDefinitionId = supervisor.processDefId AND (supervisor.userId = :userId OR (supervisor.id IN ( SELECT supervisor.id FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.supervisor.mapping.model.impl.SProcessSupervisorImpl AS supervisor, org.bonitasoft.engine.identity.model.impl.SUserMembershipImpl as um WHERE um.userId = :userId AND ( (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId <= 0) OR (supervisor.roleId = um.roleId AND supervisor.groupId <= 0) OR (supervisor.groupId = um.groupId AND supervisor.roleId = um.roleId) ) ) ) )
SELECT ref FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.business.data.SARefBusinessDataInstanceImpl AS ref WHERE ref.name = :name AND ref.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

SELECT ref FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.business.data.SARefBusinessDataInstanceImpl AS ref WHERE ref.name = :name AND ref.flowNodeInstanceId = :flowNodeInstanceId
DELETE FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.core.process.instance.model.archive.impl.business.data.SARefBusinessDataInstanceImpl WHERE processInstanceId = :processInstanceId
